subtitle: We work on projects that make a real difference, providing clear, efficient, and goal-oriented solutions. We remove obstacles and deliver solutions that work, so you can focus on what truly matters.

whatWorks.title: We do what works
whatWorks.text: We keep it simple: if it works, it works—no inflated marketing talk.

weCollaborate.title: We collaborate
weCollaborate.text: We think strategically with you and support you through execution.

weSolve.title: We solve
weSolve.text: We remove obstacles with solutions that truly work.

weDeliver.title: We deliver
weDeliver.text: We're committed to bringing your vision to life and making a real impact.

webAndPlatformDevelopment.title: Web & Platform development
webAndPlatformDevelopment.text: We develop user-friendly solutions tailored to your organization.

processOptimization.title: Process optimization
processOptimization.text: We simplify processes and boost productivity

iotAndOptimization.title: IoT & Automation
iotAndOptimization.text: We integrate systems and devices, enabling faster and more efficient workflows.

strategicInnovation.title: Strategic innovation
strategicInnovation.text: We explore new ideas and growth opportunities—from vision to realization.

1-on-1Coaching&Support.title: 1-on-1 Coaching & Support
1-on-1Coaching&Support.text: Personal guidance for developers and stakeholders, with immediate feedback and result in code, UX, and processes.

growthAndEfficiency.subtitle: Businesses focussed on:
growthAndEfficiency.title: Growth & Efficiency
growthAndEfficiency.text: From startups to SMEs and beyond—if you want to grow and streamline operations.

innovativeIdeas.subtitle: Organizations with
innovativeIdeas.title: Innovative Ideas
innovativeIdeas.text: For those bold enough to embrace new insights and stay ahead of the curve.

focusAndBalance.subtitle: Teams seeking
focusAndBalance.title: Focus & Balance
focusAndBalance.text: For those wanting to drive change and innovation, whether through automation, digitalization, or sustainability.

trulyHelpPeople: Truly helping people & organizations move forward

byRemovingObstacles.firstPart: By removing obstacles and deliver solutions that work,
byRemovingObstacles.secondPart: so you can focus on what really matters.

shortIntroduction.title: Short introduction
shortIntroduction.text: My name is Edgar Ravenhorst. With over 10 years of experience in full-stack web development, I work alongside you and the team to achieve the results you strive for.

getStarted.title: Get started!
getStarted.text: Work with us and discover what we can do for your organization.

contactUs.title: Contact us:
contactUs.connectWithUs: Connect with us on social media
